name: Ligaw
description:
Ligaw is a Philippine Based Indie Horror Game developed by Raven Studios, student developers who are currently 4th Year taking Bachelor of Science in Entertainment and Multimedia Computing from University of Caloocan City.

Watch on your own risk (Spoiler Alert)

PaoLuL  Gloco Kristian PH

 Capstone/ Thesis Project - University of Caloocan City (Computer Studies Department) Bachelor of Science in Entertainment and Multimedia Computing

Please consider answering our form first before downloading! https://forms.gle/W5Swte2QQeDJfeuj6

We do this to tally and monitor who participate in our open beta, we appreciate suggestions and reporting of bugs and glitches. this will help us improve our game in the future.

Like & Follow us: www.facebook.com/ligaw2021
